entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 'dotnet nuget why' option to show unique parent packages: --depth 1 #45464
  • [NET9] dotnet test hangs during build #45461
  • Inevitable breaking changes because of code analysis and TreatWarningsAsErrors=true #45453
  • catch-22 regarding running `dotnet restore` vs. `dotnet workload restore` first #45447

Closed

  • Unable to install .NET 8 SDK on Alpine following official instructions #37790
  • Test ChangeFileInFSharpProject is failing on Linux in 9.0.1xx #45457
  • ProcessFrameworkReferences generates an incorrect RuntimeIdentifier when using OutputPath and AppendTargetFrameworkToOutputPath #45446
  • Visual Studio for mac Microsoft.AspNetCore.App downgrade Error #2586
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Use a crossgen2 that runs on the host for R2Ring in a VMR build #45463
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Setup binskim globbing to artifacts/bin w/ workaround #45462
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable dotnet/sdk debs and rpms in the VMR #45460
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Expand MSBuildSdkResolver #45459
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create document on safely executing repros Fixes #45341 #45456
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Restore detailed test logging to console output #45454
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Detects pre-compressed assets (#44976) #45448
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #45392
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix `Change failed to apply (error code: ...)` intermittent failures #45097
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Watch, 9.0.2
  • Fix a set of test issues caused by an old blob feed and try to fix up the nullable change we rushed in #45420
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2591265 #44765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Expand MSBuildSdkResolver #45364
    untriaged, Area-SdkResolvers
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Copy dump file to the Helix upload location #45385
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Upgrade latest Alpine to 3.21 for VMR builds #45415
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Fix incorrect apphost being used when publishing for self-contained single-file with `NoBuild=true` #45400
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Don't download Windows SDK ref pack for C++ projects #44956
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Enable ASP.NET Core installers on Linux in the VMR #45437
    untriaged, Area-VMR

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2601367 #45465
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable Nullable Reference Types in Test Projects #44862
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, 10.0.1xx
  • File watcher improvements #45131
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45427
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45365
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Add support for .NET 9.0 web project templates #45423
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • Support package@version syntax for dotnet workload search/update/install version Fixes #42367 #45156
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • sln-remove: Support for slnx #45160
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not automatically add nuget.org as a package source when it is absent from nuget.config Fixes #44312 #45410
    untriaged, Area-Templates
  • Use managed Mach-O signer on non-Mac hosts #45019
    area-Host, untriaged
  • [DO NOT MERGE} Skip a few tests on osx #45419
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-alpha.1.24612.1 #45435
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Copy dump file to the Helix upload location #45345
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [dotnet-watch] Improve failure reporting in tests #44879
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add hook for importing .props file after .NET SDK props #45151
    untriaged, Area-ILLink, consider-for-documentation
